pages.text: Serened is given with serene salads to mobs, becoming neutral,weakening them but upping health
pages.title: Serened

pages.text: Handling eggs of dinosaurs will anger them
pages.title: Egg Anger

pages.text: Carnivorous Dinosaurs will scavenge dropped/placed meat on the ground
pages.title: Scavenging

pages.text: When tremorsauruses finds food but is swarming with vallumraptors. Tremorsauruses will roar loudly to ward off competition
Natural amber can be discovered to have trapped critters inside them,
pages.title: Preserved Amber

pages.text: from frogs (If Alexs Mobs is present) to flies and cockroaches
(REQUIRES ALEXS MOBS) Fly Trap plants snap at the presence of physical flies
pages.title: Fly Trapped
